title: Plugin_202203224555040
cpl.readme: This plugin is incompatible with JD Mob, please don't use them at the same time. This is a mobile layout that applies to narrow screens. It introduces the following: # A Searchbar # A Bottombar containing ''Top Left Bar'', ''Page Control'', ''Mob-only'', and ''Top Right Bar'' buttons (in that order) #** ''Top Left Bar'' >> buttons tagged ''~$:/tags/TopLeftBar'' #** ''Page control'' >> buttons tagged ''~$:/tags/PageControls'' #** ''Mob-only'' >> other buttons tagged ''~$:/tags/jd/mobbutton'' #** ''Top Right Bar'' >> buttons tagged ''~$:/tags/TopRightBar'' #** Buttons you don't want to appear here should be tagged ''~$:/tags/jd/mobno'' #*** For example, you can use this on page control buttons you want to appear in desktop layout but not in mobile layout //Note:// This layout is tied to the ''Sidebar Breakpoint'' set at ''Control Panel'' >> ''Appearance'' >> ''Theme Tweaks''. This layout is compatible with any core theme as of release date. Project Homepage on Tiddlyspot !! Version History !!! 2017-11-22 Release of version 1.0.0
cpl.title: $:/plugins/jd/mobvsimp
cpl.author: JD
